mainHero.title: Sometimes you just need to be
mainHero.subtitle: heard.
mainHero.description:
Therapy can be inaccessible, pretentious & expensive. 
 You just need to be heard. We just want to shut up & listen.

product.title: How can we be there for you?

items.title: No pressure, talk about anything.
items.description: This is a your safe space. Feel free to discuss nothing at all or everything under the sun. Our sole purpose is your comfort, well being & mental health. We just want to be there for you. No matter what.

items.title: Want advice? Let's sort it out!
items.description: Sometimes you need a solution. Unfortunately, you're emotionally attached to the situation and can't see a way. We break it down and take action, guiding you to a tailored solution.

features.title: What we do
features.subtitle: This is how we make your life better

items.name: Listen
items.description: We shut up and listen. We give you the space to get everything off your chest.

items.name: Communicate
items.description: We talk things out. Helping you decompress & declutter the mind. Clearing the table and helping you move forward to a better you.

items.name: Trust
items.description: Everything is confidential. We take your secrets to our grave.

items.name: Care
items.description: We value genuineness. From the bottom our our hearts we care and want to fully be there to support.

items.name: Round the Clock
features: Phone and Email, Video Call Support

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
